reference.title: Box Secure Storage
reference.shortdesc: Box Secure Storage is a cloud and collaboration service configured to meet the University security standards for HIPAA data.

row.entry: Box uses strong encryption to protect your data at rest and in transit.
Box allows you to define granular access controls, ensuring only authorized users can access your content.
Control over who can view and edit your data.
Box complies with industry and regulatory standards to keep your data safe and compliant.
Meet legal and regulatory requirements with ease.
Box provides version control, enabling you to track changes and recover previous versions of your files.
